title: Chiefs' Damien Williams opts out of season, 2020 Breakout Offenses (Football 7/31)
description:
Damien Williams will not play for the Chiefs in 2020 after electing to opt out of the season. How will this impact Kansas City on the field and how will it impact fantasy owners? Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and Tyler Sullivan break down the latest with opt outs before exploring offenses that are poised to break out this season. The Colts were on the list for breakout defenses, and they are on it for offenses as well. Plus, Ryan and Tyler are very high on AFC North offenses.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
